short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays the categories & tags of Etsy listings and adds advanced search filters to Etsy's search bar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can now see the tags and categories of any Etsy listing right under the listing's title. No need to use paid services or tools.

You can also use advanced search filters within Etsy's search, such as seeing a keyword's true competition and filtering your search by showing the Bestsellers first.

* New Feature: Shop Name Availability Checker
